price: 24. Mobola moko te akotela bino lelo na elanga,
arabic: أَن لَّا يَدۡخُلَنَّهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكُم مِّسۡكِينٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: an lā yadkhulannahā al-yawma ʿalaykum mis'kīnun
